name: Remy Simulator
description:
Remy simulator is a free to play  game based on the famous movie ratatouille. In this game you will play as a rat named remy who’s goal is to make a ratatouille dish. The player will have to find objects and food elements to complete his dish and win the game 

Developer : Nadghy Biodore

Game Artist : Keyla Seguret

Game Artist : Khalissa Couffignal

Game Artist : Adame Nzerwalt
